body.p: The following are the current CILib commiters.

section.title: Edwin Peer
section.p: Edwin is the project founder and the initial project was developed, based on his efforts.

section.title: Gary Pampara
section.p: Gary has been a developer of CILib ever since 2004 and is now one of the most active developers.

section.title: Andries Engelbrecht
section.p: Prof. Andries Engelbrecht is the leader of the Computational Intelligence Research Group and is an active developer. The book Swarm Intelligence has references to CILib.
